remarks: Deduce equality from restricted uniqueness, deduction version. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Nov-2019.)
statement:
reu2eqd.1 $e |- ( x = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
reu2eqd.2 $e |- ( x = C -> ( ps <-> th ) ) $.
reu2eqd.3 $e |- ( ph -> E! x e. A ps ) $.
reu2eqd.4 $e |- ( ph -> B e. A ) $.
reu2eqd.5 $e |- ( ph -> C e. A ) $.
reu2eqd.6 $e |- ( ph -> ch ) $.
reu2eqd.7 $e |- ( ph -> th ) $.
reu2eqd $p |- ( ph -> B = C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ch x $.
$d th x $.
